Jérôme Cohen-Olivar (amụrụ n'afọ 1964) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Morocco-French, nke a maara nke ọma maka Kandisha (2008), ihe nkiri fantasy nke akụkọ ifo nke Aicha Kandicha kpaliri.
Cohen-Olivar tolitere na Morocco, ebe o mere ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri super 8mm, tupu ọ kwaga Los Angeles
Susan Susan, ihe nkiri mkpirikpi mbụ ya, bụ satire banyere mbata nzuzo na United States, nke Disney zụrụ maka ihe dị ka dọla pụkụ narị ato ($300,000).

The Midnight Orchestra, ihe ọchị nke dabeere na akụkọ banyere otu nwoke na-aga Morocco iji mee ka ndị egwú nna ya dịghachi ndụ, nyochara ahụmịhe ndị Juu na-ahapụ Morocco. Ọ meriri ihe nrite nke Ecumenical Jury na Montreal World Film Festival na 2015.
